description: This dataset represents the total number of Rail Containers moved through Port Authority facilities in the Port of New York and New Jersey on a monthly basis from 2000 to the present

metadata.description: This dataset represents the total number of Rail Containers moved through Port Authority facilities in the Port of New York and New Jersey on a monthly basis from 2000 to the present

name: Rail Containers Moved Through Port Authority of NY NJ Facilities:  Beginning 2000
